snippet.title: Resident Evil 2 Demo Trailer
snippet.description: Resident Evil 2, known in Japan as Biohazard 2 (バイオハザード2?), is a survival horror game by Capcom originally released for the PlayStation in 1998. It is the second installment in the Resident Evil series, and was later ported to Microsoft Windows, Nintendo 64, Dreamcast and GameCube.
